trait.name: Plant Camouflage
text: The alliumite has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Tearful Stench
text: Each creature other than an alliumite within 5 feet of the alliumite when it takes damage must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the Tearful Stench of all alliumites for 1 minute.

action.name: Thorn Dart
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Grass Blade
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
